= Release Notes =
== soi-toolkit v0.1.9 ==
Release date: Oct 23 2010

This is a maintenance release with bug fixes and minor enhancements based on feedback from the first projects using soi-toolkit.

Release Notes can be found here: [http://code.google.com/p/soi-toolkit/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release0.1.9 Release Notes]

== Upgrade from earlier versions of soi-toolkit ==

 * Existing projects are updated by replacing the soi.toolkit version in the parent-pom...

 * The Eclipse plugin can be upgraded by following the instructions here.

== soi-toolkit v0.1.8 ==
Release date: Oct 11 2010

This is the first release of soi-toolkit.

It contains:
 * An [InstallationGuide Installation guide]
 * A set of initial [Tutorials Getting started tutorials] on how to create components and services 
 (very few types of services are supported initially)
 * Runtime components ([http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/org/soitoolkit/commons/ Maven repository])
 * Integration pattern driven code generator ([http://soi-toolkit.googlecode.com/svn/eclipse-update-site/ Eclipse plugin])
 * This web site
